	        		    		<h2 class="main_title W_fb W_f14">版面栏目</h2>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【转发加油！为<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E5%B0%91%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#疫情下的开学少年#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】一定是特别光明的结尾，才配得上这么出其不意的开局。各地陆续复学复课，梦想再次插上翅膀。因疫情见证历史，这一届学子注定不凡。今天，延迟一个月的<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E5%80%92%E8%AE%A1%E6%97%B670%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#全国高考倒计时70天#</a>，让结局不留遗憾，让过程更加完美，做好防护，专心备战。​​​转发，为少年加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IFmlovCwM&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504253&amp;ssig=pdyQfQv0t1" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498573427536272" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFmlovCwM?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-28 06:35" date="1588026947000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498573427536272:fromprofile"> 2020-4-28 06:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8798%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超过98万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学疫情实时监测系统显示，截至美东时间27日下午5时31分，美国共有新冠病毒感染病例985374例，死亡55906例。此外，最新数据显示，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87300%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠病毒感染病例超过300万#</a>。（张梦旭） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4498470527903499" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFjFqxa3N?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 23:46" date="1588002414000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498470527903499:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 23:46</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】历经3个月的并肩战斗，中央指导组今天离鄂返京。从贯彻落实党中央部署，到指导抗疫，协调重大事务，再到督察不作为、乱作为，中央指导组不负重托不辱使命，向党和人民交上了优异答卷。如今，武汉从黑白重回彩色，湖北从冰冻走向全面复苏。坚持底线思维，我们将迎来更葱郁的盛夏。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%BE%AE%E8%AF%84%23&amp;from=default">#人民微评#</a>：让数据多跑路、民众少跑腿】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2320%E9%A1%B9%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%94%B1%E5%B1%85%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E6%9D%91%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%87%BA%E5%85%B7%23&amp;from=default">#20项证明不应由居委会村委会出具#</a>，为社区居委会减负，杜绝“社区万能章” “社区成为证明大本营”等现象，值得叫好。社区不开，谁来开？除了给民众指明方向，还要尽最大程度减少不该开的证明。通过信息共享，避免民众为开证跑断腿、磨破嘴。                                            </div>

                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4498269897995132" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民日报" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民日报</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转发扩散！以下<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2320%E9%A1%B9%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%94%B1%E5%B1%85%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E6%9D%91%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%87%BA%E5%85%B7%23&amp;from=default">#20项证明不应由居委会村委会出具#</a>】六部门发布通知，明确《不应由基层群众性自治组织出具证明事项清单（第一批）》，明确户籍证明、户口登记项目内容变更申请证明、居民养犬证明、无犯罪记录证明、婚姻状况证明、出生证明、死亡证明、<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%B2%E5%B1%9E%E5%85%B3%E7%B3%BB%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%E7%AD%89%E4%B8%8D%E5%86%8D%E7%94%B1%E5%B1%85%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E6%9D%91%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%87%BA%E5%85%B7%23&amp;from=default">#亲属关系证明等不再由居委会村委会出具#</a>。 ​​​​                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498457341554334" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFjka6wlU?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 22:54" date="1587999270000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498457341554334:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 22:54</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%80%81%E5%88%AB%E5%BC%A0%E9%9D%99%E9%9D%99%23&amp;from=default">#送别张静静#</a>】今天上午，山东省第一批支援湖北医疗队员山东大学齐鲁医院护士张静静的遗体在济南火化。丈夫韩文涛表示，妻子的后事处理一切从简，不举行遗体告别仪式，不开追悼会。4月6日，张静静在按规定集中隔离医学观察期满，即将返家休息时，突发心脏骤停逝世。转发送别，英雄一路走好！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5185817263&amp;cid=4498457547002441&amp;nick=老王爷儿&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <a name="4498450135285262" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFj8xmaWa?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 22:25" date="1587997552000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498450135285262:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 22:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%81%AB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B18%E5%90%8D%E6%B6%88%E9%98%B2%E5%91%98%E9%A9%BB%E5%AE%8888%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#火神山8名消防员驻守88天#</a>，今日撤勤】武汉市火神山消防救援站27日撤勤，8名在此驻守了88天的消防员向火神山医院告别。自1月31日入驻火神山消防救援站以来，8名消防员共开展消防巡查90余次。在医院投入使用期间，运送隔离鞋套2000双，协助医院防疫消杀4.5万平米；搭建出院患者候车帐篷，并坚持每日 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFj8xmaWa" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498450135285262:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498450135285262&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                           		<img src="//wx2.sinaimg.cn/thumb150/a716fd45ly1ge8oyxtz2kj20pu0j2dhf.jpg">
         		                            </li>

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498444117046608" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFiYPtz8Y?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 22:01" date="1587996117000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498444117046608:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 22:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：我知道你很累，但是别轻易放弃啊】不管是生活、工作还是家庭，我们需要承担的太多太多，总有说不尽的辛酸和委屈，总会有人不看好你。但那又怎样，坚持不懈的人终究会被世界温柔以待。爬出一条又一条“沟”，收获一次又一次成长，活成自己想要的模样。请记得，放弃很容易，但坚持一定很酷！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFiYPtz8Y" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498444117046608:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498444117046608&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

                    <h4 class="WB_feed_spec_tit W_autocut">【夜读】我知道你很累，但是别轻易放弃啊</h4>
                                            <div class="WB_feed_spec_brieftxt"><span class="S_txt2">当你感到生活困难时，你就是在走上坡路，你就是在成长。</span></div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504253&amp;ssig=pdyQfQv0t1" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498431198213806" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFiDZysMK?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 21:10" date="1587993037000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498431198213806:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 21:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【青岛<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E5%9C%BA%E6%98%8E%E7%81%AB%E5%B7%B2%E6%89%91%E7%81%AD%23&amp;from=default">#小珠山火场明火已扑灭#</a> 所有逆行救火的英雄们辛苦了！】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%BB%84%E5%B2%9B%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=黄岛发布">@黄岛发布</a>，截至今天下午4时许，经过几天的积极扑救，目前小珠山火场明火已扑灭。通过开设隔离带、水泵喷洒等手段，转入火场清理看守阶段。指挥部现正组织力量全面彻底清理火场树下零星暗火，直升机配合地面力量实施洒水作业，确保灭火 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFiDZysMK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498431198213806:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498431198213806&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                                <a name="4498412265795454" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFi9sojF4?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 19:55" date="1587988523000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498412265795454:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 19:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【太梦幻！摄影师在南加州拍到<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%91%E8%93%9D%E5%85%89%E6%B5%B7%E8%B1%9A%E7%BE%A4%23&amp;from=default">#发蓝光海豚群#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c9/2018new_chongjing_org.png" title="[憧憬]" alt="[憧憬]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，摄影师帕特里克·科因在南加州纽波特海岸发现一群“发蓝光”的海豚。视频中，一群海豚在黑暗的海水中游着，留下一条条蓝色的光斑。据悉，一些浮游生物会发出电蓝色的光，受到波浪或船只的干扰时，水就会看起来是蓝色的。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498412265795454:1034-video:1034%3A4498317871349772:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498412265795454:2803301701" title="环视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A7V9G7" alt="http://t.cn/A6A7V9G7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>环视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-27 20:41</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498403910244433" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFhVZ11At?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 19:22" date="1587986531000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498403910244433:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 19:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【江苏宿迁<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2380%E5%B2%81%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA10%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%A1%E5%A6%BB%E7%A7%8D6000%E6%A0%AA%E7%89%A1%E4%B8%B9%23&amp;from=default">#80岁老人10年为亡妻种6000株牡丹#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】江苏宿迁泗洪县金锁镇有一片花海，6000株白色牡丹花吸引了很多人的注意。一位名叫许其亚的80岁老人，一直守护着这些花，他说，老伴生前爱花，所以自己就开荒种了这些花。“我看到这花，就像看到老伴一样，我想这样一直种下去。”<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498403910244433:1034-video:1034%3A4498344958165002:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498403910244433:2803301701" title="现代快报快快看视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A7OTgE" alt="http://t.cn/A6A7OTgE" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>现代快报快快看视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            </li>
        </ul>
    
<!-- /VideoCard -->

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                                                                                                                        【拒绝狩猎贩卖食用野生动物，转发承诺！】经过4个月奋战，日前<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%89%E6%9E%97%E7%A0%B4%E8%8E%B7%E9%9D%9E%E6%B3%95%E7%8B%A9%E7%8C%8E%E5%A4%A7%E6%A1%88%23&amp;from=default">#吉林破获非法狩猎大案#</a>，抓获犯罪嫌疑人27名。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%89%E6%9E%97%E6%94%B6%E7%BC%B413410%E4%BB%B6%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E7%89%A9%E6%AD%BB%E4%BD%93%E5%8F%8A%E5%88%B6%E5%93%81%23&amp;from=default">#吉林收缴13410件野生动物死体及制品#</a>，其中国家一级保护野生动物紫貂4只，二级保护野生动物花尾榛鸡、猫头鹰、雕枭等70只，国家“三有”保护动物及制品13336件。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498390148358442:3000000055-webpage:3000000055%3A5a669d1af7bab0ace77de10ce0ae8c70" title="吉林破获非法狩猎大案 收缴13410件野生动物死..." href="http://t.cn/A6AzAR1l" alt="http://t.cn/A6AzAR1l" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>吉林破获非法狩猎大案 收缴13410件野生动物死...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498376580577049" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFhdU2q7f?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 17:33" date="1587980015000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498376580577049:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 17:33</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【“想你们了，孩子们！”<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%AE%BF%E7%AE%A1%E9%98%BF%E5%A7%A8%E4%B8%8E%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E5%90%8E%E6%B3%AA%E5%A5%94%23&amp;from=default">#武汉宿管阿姨与学生视频后泪奔#</a>】1月25日以来，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=武汉理工大学">@武汉理工大学</a> 鉴湖校区F栋宿管毛红娟就一直坚守在宿舍楼。3个月以来，她经常收到学生的求助：浇花、扔垃圾、寄快递……在与大四学生视频云看宿舍后，毛阿姨一时没忍住，潸然泪下，她说真的很想念孩子们。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498376580577049:1034-video:1034%3A4498353808146436:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498376580577049:2803301701" title="长江日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A7EGil" alt="http://t.cn/A6A7EGil" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>长江日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%BF%E7%88%BD%E7%A7%B0%E5%B8%8C%E6%9C%9B%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%8F%8A%E6%97%B6%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%85%E5%A4%96%E8%B4%A8%E7%96%91%23&amp;from=default">#耿爽称希望美国及时回应国内外质疑#</a>】27日，耿爽回答记者提问时表示，最近一段时间美国国内有不少质疑。“这些声音包括疫情到底最早何时在美国出现？美国政府是否隐瞒了什么？为什么急着向其他国家和国际组织甩锅？在这些问题上，我们希望美国政府能够及时的回应本国人民和国际社会的关切，是否也可 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFh5RbNJI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498371592812798:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498371592812798&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498365444714256" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFgVWjMoo?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 16:49" date="1587977360000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498365444714256:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 16:49</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【5月1日起<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%A4%90%E9%A5%AE%E4%B8%8D%E5%BE%97%E4%B8%BB%E5%8A%A8%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1%E6%80%A7%E9%A4%90%E5%85%B7%23&amp;from=default">#北京餐饮不得主动提供一次性餐具#</a>】北京市商务局相关负责人今天介绍，《北京市餐饮服务不得主动提供的一次性餐具目录》将从5月1日起施行。饭馆餐厅不得主动提供的一次性餐具包括，筷子、勺子、刀（刀具）、叉子，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E5%8D%96%E5%B9%B3%E5%8F%B0%E9%BB%98%E8%AE%A4%E4%B8%8D%E5%8B%BE%E9%80%89%E9%A4%90%E5%85%B7%E7%AD%89%E4%BA%8E%E4%B8%8D%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%23&amp;from=default">#外卖平台默认不勾选餐具等于不需要#</a>。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6A73lMJ" alt="http://t.cn/A6A73lMJ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%8F%8D%E5%AF%B9%E7%BE%8E%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%85%9A%E6%8B%BF%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%AF%B4%E4%BA%8B%E6%8D%9E%E5%8F%96%E9%80%89%E7%A5%A8%23&amp;from=default">#外交部反对美共和党拿中国说事捞取选票#</a>】4月27日，外交部发言人耿爽主持例行记者会。有记者提问：美国媒体24日曝光了一份共和党参议院全国委员会向竞选机构发送的备忘录，这份长达57页的备忘录建议共和党候选人通过“积极进攻中国”来应对疫情危机。备忘录中强调了三条主要攻击路线，一是指责“中 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFgLw2Ly7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498358980659439:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498358980659439&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style=""><!-- 评论盖楼 -->
<div class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1 WB_feed_repeat_v3" node-type="need_approval_comment">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498353125483683" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFgC4n0yv?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 16:00" date="1587974423000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498353125483683:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：湖北介绍<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%A8%B3%E5%B0%B1%E4%B8%9A%E4%BF%9D%E6%B0%91%E7%94%9F%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#武汉应对疫情稳就业保民生情况#</a>】4月27日（今天）下午四点，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第86场新闻发布会，介绍武汉市应对疫情稳就业保民生工作情况，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498353125483683:1034-video:1034%3A4498363031420948:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498353125483683:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A7HoNL" alt="http://t.cn/A6A7HoNL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4498349971779015" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFgwZ7sNN?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 15:47" date="1587973671000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498349971779015:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 15:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【5月1日起<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%A5%E6%9F%A5%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%BA%E5%95%86%E8%B6%85%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E5%A1%91%E6%96%99%E8%A2%8B%23&amp;from=default">#北京严查市场商超免费提供塑料袋#</a>】据北京市市场监管局，从5月1日起，北京市将重点在农贸市场、便利店、超市等商品零售场所，开展为期3个月的塑料袋专项整治行动，对销售、使用超薄塑料袋，以及免费提供塑料购物袋等违法违规行为依法予以查处。按照《北京市生活垃圾管理条例》的规定，“禁 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFgwZ7sNN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498349971779015:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498349971779015&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <ul class="WB_row_line WB_row_r4 clearfix S_line2">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504262&amp;ssig=CIj6Qe55M8" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498345315626210" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFgptnBDk?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 15:29" date="1587972561000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498345315626210:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 15:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E8%88%AA%E6%9C%AC%E5%91%A8%E5%B0%86%E5%AE%89%E6%8E%925%E6%9E%B6%E6%AC%A1%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%E6%8E%A5900%E5%85%AC%E6%B0%91%E5%9B%9E%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#民航本周将安排5架次航班接900公民回国#</a>】中国民航局飞行标准司副司长韩光祖表示，4月20日至26日，民航一共安排了4架次临时航班，协助在美国、英国和意大利的854名我国公民回国，其中留学生711名。本周计划安排5架次临时航班，分别赴美国、英国、意大利和西班牙，预计将接回900名我国公民，其中主要 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFgptnBDk" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498345315626210:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498345315626210&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <li><span class="line S_line1">

                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E8%BF%911%E4%B8%AA%E6%9C%88%E6%8A%A5%E5%91%8A107%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国近1个月报告107例境外关联病例#</a>】国家卫生健康委疾控局监察专员王斌表示，自3月21日以来，全国共报告107例和境外输入病例相关联的病例，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%911%E6%9C%88%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%A0%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%B0%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A88.4%25%23&amp;from=default">#近1月境外输入关联病例占本地确诊88.4%#</a>。这些关联病例之间有非常明确的密切接触史或共同暴露史，主要分布在边境和一些沿海重点省份，并主要发生在家庭里。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFgnAD23n" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498344149302689:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498344149302689&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4498345088956030&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=6124739136&amp;commentmid=4498344149302689" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>3</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-27 15:28</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%8F%96%E5%BE%97%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%E6%80%A7%E6%88%90%E6%95%88%23&amp;from=default">#疫情防控取得重要阶段性成效#</a>】国家卫健委新闻发言人米锋表示，4月26日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E6%97%A0%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%92%8C%E7%96%91%E4%BC%BC%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖北首次无现有确诊和疑似病例#</a>报告，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B3100%E4%BE%8B%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国现有本土确诊降至100例以下#</a>，境外输入病例治愈出院超过1000例，疫情防控取得重要阶段性成效。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498341268576824:1042163-video:1042163%3A4498341199806493:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498341268576824:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A7NdTF" alt="http://t.cn/A6A7NdTF" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】27日15时国务院联防联控机制召开新闻发布会，介绍依法<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#防控境外疫情输入最新情况#</a>，国家卫生健康委、海关总署、移民局、民航局有关司局负责人回答媒体提问↓↓<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播，一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498338005244887:1034-video:1034%3A4498351203221541:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498338005244887:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A79Yz0" alt="http://t.cn/A6A79Yz0" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%BE%E5%AE%B6%E9%95%BF%E6%BF%80%E5%8A%A8%E6%88%90%E8%A1%A8%E6%83%85%E5%8C%85%23&amp;from=default">#孩子复课家长激动成表情包#</a> 网友：过于真实<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/83/2018new_kuxiao_org.png" title="[允悲]" alt="[允悲]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，各地中小学陆续迎来开学复课。有<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E6%8B%85%E5%BF%83%E5%BF%98%E4%BA%86%E5%90%8C%E5%AD%A6%E9%95%BF%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%A0%B7%23&amp;from=default">#小学生担心忘了同学长什么样#</a>。孩子兴奋之余，精疲力尽的家长们也激动成表情包，“在家带了两个多月，我都怕了”。<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8f/2018new_haha_org.png" title="[哈哈]" alt="[哈哈]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498332124932580:1034-video:1034%3A4498331741913094:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498332124932580:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6A7a8aj" alt="http://t.cn/A6A7a8aj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4498320439612142" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFfLlEkyy?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 13:50" date="1587966630000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498320439612142:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 13:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【火力全开！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E5%90%A8%E5%A4%A7%E9%A9%B1%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E6%B5%B7%E4%B8%8A%E8%AE%AD%E7%BB%83%E7%94%BB%E9%9D%A2%23&amp;from=default">#万吨大驱最新海上训练画面#</a>震撼来袭！】今年1月，我国自主研制的新型万吨级驱逐舰首舰南昌舰正式入列，标志着海军驱逐舰实现由第三代向第四代的跨越。还记得万吨大驱入列时的霸气登场吗？最新海上训练画面曝光↓↓<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498320439612142:1034-video:1034%3A4498014597742607:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498320439612142:2803301701" title="人民海军的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AvCJrc" alt="http://t.cn/A6AvCJrc" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民海军的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E6%9D%8E%E5%85%B0%E5%A8%9F%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E5%AF%84%E8%AF%AD%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%BE%E5%AD%A6%E5%AD%90%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山李兰娟张文宏寄语复课学子#</a>】随着各地学子逐步有序到校复课，钟南山、李兰娟、张文宏三位抗疫专家给学子们送来寄语。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%AF%B4%E6%9C%89%E5%9B%BD%E6%89%8D%E6%9C%89%E5%AE%B6%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山说有国才有家#</a>，能有好好学习的环境很不容易；张文宏希望同学们不负韶华、只争朝夕；李兰娟说，疫情就是课堂，希望同学们珍惜时间、敬畏生命。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498310285189311:2017607-video:2017607%3A4498270022729760:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498310285189311:2803301701" title="中新视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AhYaxQ" alt="http://t.cn/A6AhYaxQ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>中新视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【中央指导组离鄂返京】湖北省、武汉市疫情防控已由应急性超常规防控向常态化防控转变。经习近平总书记和党中央批准，中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理孙春兰率<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%AE%E6%8C%87%E5%AF%BC%E7%BB%84%E4%BA%8E4%E6%9C%8827%E6%97%A5%E7%A6%BB%E9%84%82%E8%BF%94%E4%BA%AC%23&amp;from=default">#中央指导组于4月27日离鄂返京#</a>。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E9%A6%96%E7%9B%B8%E8%BF%94%E5%9B%9E%E9%A6%96%E7%9B%B8%E5%BA%9C%E5%B0%86%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%23&amp;from=default">#英国首相返回首相府将复工#</a>】英国媒体报道，首相约翰逊已经返回位于唐宁街十号的首相官邸，并将于27日恢复工作。约翰逊在3月27日确诊，4月6日晚因病情恶化转入重症监护室治疗。当地时间4月12日，英国首相约翰逊出院休养至今。（央视）<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4498291356505468:1034-video:1034%3A4498252230230041:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498291356505468:2803301701" title="环视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6AhakXJ" alt="http://t.cn/A6AhakXJ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>环视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>
                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

        </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498280472327297" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFeIT9Lr3?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 11:11" date="1587957101000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498280472327297:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 11:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B4%E5%9F%BA%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%E5%8F%8C%E8%AF%ADBGM%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%84%9F%E8%B0%A2%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%23&amp;from=default">#巴基斯坦双语BGM视频感谢中国援助#</a>，网友：双语和配乐有心了】25日巴基斯坦政府官方发布一则视频感谢中方派出军队抗疫专家组赴巴基斯坦开展防疫工作，并紧急援助核酸检测试剂盒、防护服等疫情防控物资。这则感谢视频不仅配上了欢快的背景音乐，还细心地用中巴双语来表达情谊深厚，你听出来了吗？ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFeIT9Lr3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498280472327297:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498280472327297&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4498269897995132" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFerPxxTK?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 10:29" date="1587954580000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498269897995132:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 10:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转发扩散！以下<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2320%E9%A1%B9%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%94%B1%E5%B1%85%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E6%9D%91%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%87%BA%E5%85%B7%23&amp;from=default">#20项证明不应由居委会村委会出具#</a>】六部门发布通知，明确《不应由基层群众性自治组织出具证明事项清单（第一批）》，明确户籍证明、户口登记项目内容变更申请证明、居民养犬证明、无犯罪记录证明、婚姻状况证明、出生证明、死亡证明、<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%B2%E5%B1%9E%E5%85%B3%E7%B3%BB%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%E7%AD%89%E4%B8%8D%E5%86%8D%E7%94%B1%E5%B1%85%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E6%9D%91%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%87%BA%E5%85%B7%23&amp;from=default">#亲属关系证明等不再由居委会村委会出具#</a>。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/rmrb" usercard="id=2803301701">人民日报</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>：【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%BE%AE%E8%AF%84%23&amp;from=default">#人民微评#</a>：让数据多跑路、民众少跑腿】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2320%E9%A1%B9%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%8D%E5%BA%94%E7%94%B1%E5%B1%85%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E6%9D%91%E5%A7%94%E4%BC%9A%E5%87%BA%E5%85%B7%23&amp;from=default">#20项证明不应由居委会村委会出具#</a>，为社区居委会减负，杜绝“社区万能章” “社区成为证明大本营”等现象，值得叫好。社区不开，谁来开？除了给民众指明方向，还要尽最大程度减少不该开的证明。通过信息共享，避免民众为开证跑断腿、磨破嘴。        </div>

                                                                                                                        【转发参与！跟TA一起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E7%99%BD%E8%A1%A3%E5%A4%A9%E4%BD%BF%E5%94%B1%E9%A6%96%E6%AD%8C%23&amp;from=default">#为白衣天使唱首歌#</a>】这个艰难的2020，因为冲上一线的他们，我们才终于迎来明媚春天。如何表达、感谢？我们发起"致敬白衣天使”线上音乐会<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%85%AC%E7%9B%8A%E4%BA%91%E6%BC%94%E5%94%B1%E4%BC%9A?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=公益云演唱会">@公益云演唱会</a> 和周杰伦等歌手一起为白衣天使唱首歌。期待谁的演出，@ TA！也欢迎上传你的演唱视频，唱出心声。感谢有你，山河无恙！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【开学复课后，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E9%83%A8%E4%B8%8D%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E5%8D%A0%E7%94%A8%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F%E8%A1%A5%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#教育部不建议占用假期补课#</a>】教育部应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组办公室主任王登峰近日表示，①<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%BE%E6%9C%89%E4%B8%89%E6%9D%A1%E7%BA%A2%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#开学复课有三条红线#</a>：疫情没得到基本控制前不能开学，校园防控措施没到位不能开学，师生的公共卫生安全得不到保障不能开学；②可调整周一到周五学习的时间，比如每天增加半小时到一小时就 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFe4qE1ST" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498255389540367:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498255389540367&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">
                                                <a target="_blank" suda-uatrack="key=click comments&amp;value=click:home:2" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFe4qE1ST?filter=hot&amp;root_comment_id=4498256081960698" action-data="more_comment=small&amp;root_comment_id=4498256081960698&amp;id=">共332条回复</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>
                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【转存！想看五月天，收好这份<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E5%87%BA%E8%A1%8C%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%97%23&amp;from=default">#五一出行指南#</a>】假期将至，这个<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E4%BD%A0%E4%BC%9A%E5%A4%96%E5%87%BA%E6%B8%B8%E7%8E%A9%E5%90%97%23&amp;from=default">#五一你会外出游玩吗#</a>？能不能出游，专家怎么说？出行前需要做哪些准备？出了门，吃饭住宿如何解决？尽量室外游，去前先预约，保持安全间距……假期出行指南↓↓转发收藏，有备无患！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【昨天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%9C%896%E4%B8%AA%E6%9D%A5%E4%B9%8B%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%93%E7%9A%840%23&amp;from=default">#武汉有6个来之不易的0#</a>！】4月26日0—24时，湖北无新增确诊病例，湖北和<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A212%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#武汉新增治愈出院12例#</a>，无新增死亡病例，无现有确诊病例，无重症病例。无新增疑似病例，无现有疑似病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

    </ul>

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                                                                                    <!-- feed区 大数据tag -->
                    </div>
        <div class="WB_like" node-type="templeLike_ani" action-data="parise_id=p_0000" style="display:none;">

        </div>
    </div>

                                <a name="4498240239594445" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFdFZEfX7?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 08:31" date="1587947509000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498240239594445:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 08:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E25%E4%BE%8B%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增25例无症状感染者#</a>】31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者25例，其中境外输入无症状感染者1例；当日无转为确诊病例；当日解除医学观察51例（境外输入21例）；<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%9A%E5%9C%A8%E5%8C%BB%E5%AD%A6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85974%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#尚在医学观察无症状感染者974例#</a>（境外输入131例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx1.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2Fa716fd45ly1ge815zt8ntj20u01ekasn.jpg">
                        <li class="WB_pic li_1 S_bg1 S_line2 bigcursor li_n_h " action-data="isGoldenV=0&amp;isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1ge815zt8ntj20u01ekasn&amp;object_ids=1042018%3A6a837c0d333afd34e07bdc23c4344b7e&amp;photo_tag_pids=&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;mid=4498240239594445&amp;pic_ids=a716fd45ly1ge815zt8ntj20u01ekasn&amp;pic_objects=" action-type="feed_list_media_img" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_newimage_feed&amp;value=image_feed_unfold:4498240239594445:a716fd45ly1ge815zt8ntj20u01ekasn:2803301701:0">

          <i class="W_loading" style="display:none;"></i>

                                <a name="4498239824665999" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IFdFkjzQ3?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-27 08:30" date="1587947410000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4498239824665999:fromprofile"> 2020-4-27 08:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A3%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊3例新冠肺炎#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增2例境外输入#</a>】4月26日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例3例，其中2例为境外输入病例，1例为本土病例（黑龙江1例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例5例，其中4例为境外输入病例，1例为本土病例（北京1例）。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;当日 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFdFkjzQ3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498239824665999:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498239824665999&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民日报钟声：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E6%95%A3%E5%B8%83%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E7%BD%AA%E8%B4%A3%E9%9A%BE%E9%80%83%23&amp;from=default">#蓬佩奥散布政治病毒罪责难逃#</a>】正当新冠病毒在美催演一出又一出惨剧之际，美国国务卿蓬佩奥却四处散播同样凶险的“政治病毒”，以偏见和傲慢煽风点火，造谣生事，消散人类共同抗“疫”精力，力图把全球都拉入对抗冲突的局面。疾在腠理，不治恐深。奉劝蓬佩奥之流，停止喋喋不休的反华 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFdzJ9VaB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498236352364717:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498236352364717&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#中国抗疫#</a>：世界该有的视角】几个月来，我们用行动证明了中国人的勇气、坚毅和责任感。我们帮助了多个国家，也听到很多不好的声音。但不必沮丧，今天的中国，再也不是几十年前的中国。我们共同的敌人是新冠病毒，团结起来，风雨过后终见彩虹！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BD%91%E5%8F%8B%E5%85%A8%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E8%A7%A3%E8%AF%BB%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#网友全英文解读中国抗疫#</a>↓↓（up主：爱力可）&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFdnE2JEG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498228860652158:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498228860652158&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/1463550355" usercard="id=1463550355">神经赖子</a>：封面照是我们科的一位护士，当时这位新华社记者给她拍了照，却没有问出她的名字。对记者来说，可能很遗憾，但在武汉，处处都是这样的无名英雄<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face"><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face"><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face">        </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%80%BB%E7%90%86%E5%AE%A3%E5%B8%83%E5%B0%86%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%A5%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%23&amp;from=default">#意大利总理宣布将进入第二阶段#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD5%E6%9C%884%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E9%80%90%E6%AD%A5%E9%87%8D%E5%90%AF%23&amp;from=default">#意大利全国5月4日起逐步重启#</a>】意大利时间4月26日晚，意大利总理孔特召开发布会宣布国家将进入与病毒共存的抗疫“第二阶段”。孔特宣布“第二阶段”复工的具体措施为，5月4日开始，民众可以在大区内活动，公园再次开放；5月18日起，零售业、博物馆、体育训练场所可 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IFcW7k95J" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4498211794801511:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4498211794801511&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7291617014" usercard="id=7291617014">城南月涌</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member5"></em></a>：我觉得别人国家的事情别人自然会谨慎处理，毕竟已经吃了这么大亏。既然他们判断情况好转，那么我倾向于相信他们的判断。很多同胞一听到别人解禁就跳出来指责他们漠视生命一意孤行，其实也有点极端，大可不必如此。        </div>

\t\t\t\t\t\t简介：    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t\t人民日报法人微博。参与、沟通、记录时代。    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t<\/span>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/li>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" “社区成为证明大本营”等现象，值得叫好。社区不开，谁来开？除了给民众指明方向，还要尽最大程度减少不该开的证明。通过信息共享，避免民众为开证跑断腿、磨破嘴。                                            <\/div>\n                                                                                                              【今天，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%80%81%E5%88%AB%E5%BC%A0%E9%9D%99%E9%9D%99%23&from=default\">#送别张静静#<\/a>】今天上午，山东省第一批支援湖北医疗队员山东大学齐鲁医院护士张静静的遗体在济南火化。丈夫韩文涛表示，妻子的后事处理一切从简，不举行遗体告别仪式，不开追悼会。4月6日，张静静在按规定集中隔离医学观察期满，即将返家休息时，突发心脏骤停逝世。转发送别，英雄一路走好！                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" 【夜读：我知道你很累，但是别轻易放弃啊】不管是生活、工作还是家庭，我们需要承担的太多太多，总有说不尽的辛酸和委屈，总会有人不看好你。但那又怎样，坚持不懈的人终究会被世界温柔以待。爬出一条又一条“沟”，收获一次又一次成长，活成自己想要的模样。请记得，放弃很容易，但坚持一定很酷！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                                                                                              【太梦幻！摄影师在南加州拍到<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%91%E8%93%9D%E5%85%89%E6%B5%B7%E8%B1%9A%E7%BE%A4%23&from=default\">#发蓝光海豚群#<\/a><img class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/c9\/2018new_chongjing_org.png\" title=\"[憧憬]\" alt=    \"[憧憬]\" type=\"face\" \/>】近日，摄影师帕特里克·科因在南加州纽波特海岸发现一群“发蓝光”的海豚。视频中，一群海豚在黑暗的海水中游着，留下一条条蓝色的光斑。据悉，一些浮游生物会发出电蓝色的光，受到波浪或船只的干扰时，水就会看起来是蓝色的。<a suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4498403910244433:fromprofile\"> 2020-4-27 19:22<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\" class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民日报\">\n                                                                                                                        【江苏宿迁<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%2380%E5%B2%81%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA10%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%A1%E5%A6%BB%E7%A7%8D6000%E6%A0%AA%E7%89%A1%E4%B8%B9%23&from=default\">#80岁老人10年为亡妻种6000株牡丹#<\/a><img class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/8a\/2018new_xin_org.png\" title=\"[心]\" alt=    \"[心]\" type=\"face\" \/>】江苏宿迁泗洪县金锁镇有一片花海，6000株白色牡丹花吸引了很多人的注意。一位名叫许其亚的80岁老人，一直守护着这些花，他说，老伴生前爱花，所以自己就开荒种了这些花。“我看到这花，就像看到老伴一样，我想这样一直种下去。”<a  suda-uatrack=\"key=tblog_card&value=click_title:4498403910244433:1034-video:1034%3A4498344958165002:page_100206_home:2803301701:4498403910244433:2803301701\" title=\"现代快报快快看视频的微博视频\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6A7OTgE\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6A7OTgE\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon ficon_cd_video\">L<\/i>现代快报快快看视频的微博视频<\/a> ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                                <div class=\"WB_expand_media_box \" style=\"display: none;\" node-type=\"feed_list_media_disp\"><\/div>\n                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->\n<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->\n                    <div class=\"WB_media_wrap clearfix\" node-type=\"feed_list_media_prev\">\n        <div class=\"media_box\">\n            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->\n
